entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "Create and assign [field|property]" quick fix generates Linux line endings on Windows machine/project #70685
  • Rename Function does not rename #region (only in preview) #70684
  • Complete Word fails in collection expression #70677
  • MSBuildWorkspaceLoader cannot access binlog (regression in dotnet/format tests) #70674
    17.9 P2

Closed

  • Duplicate syntax node callbacks for PrimaryConstructorBaseType #70488
    17.9
  • The call is ambiguous when using collections literals with interpolated strings #70238
    17.9
  • Cross compilation for `arm64` on `x64` with a source generator in a solution fails #60744
    17.6
  • Unify the way MethodCompiler gets synthesized lowered method bodies #67104
    Backlog
  • Endless popup error messages #70025
    17.9
  • AnalyzerRunner throws an Exception: Missing assembly 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Workspaces.MSBuild.BuildHost' #70139
    17.9
  • Add documentation for IDE0210 #65761
  • Add documentation for IDE0230 #65764
    17.6
  • "Remove Unused Parameter" Refactoring #67229
    17.9
  • [Feature request]: An option to opt-in for internal API analysis for `IDE0051` (Remove unused private member) #69483
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Revise compound assignment for nullable #70687
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Indicate when syntax errors are first calculated. #70686
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update NuGet-packages.md for 17.8 #70682
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2307001 #70681
  • Only use length-based dispatch optimization under `/optimize+` #70680
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Handle ref returning receivers in dynamic calls #70676
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • 67328 - Update the casing of remove unecessary usings in lightbulb menu #70675
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Avoid duplicate analyzer callbacks for PrimaryConstructorBaseTypeSyntax and BaseListSyntax nodes #70655
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Look scope by scope for method group natural type #69158
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #70683
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Next
  • Update Versions.props for 17.8 #70679
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix capitalization in recently added comments. #70678
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Rely on GenerateMethodBody/SynthesizesLoweredBoundBody APIs to synthesize body for field like event accessors #70657
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Add MSBuild.BuildHost to AnalyzerRunner project #70361
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Disable specific squareBracket completion tests #70673
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Run suppressors insofar as there are suppressible errors #62641
    Area-Compilers, Blocked, Community, 17.9
  • Method group natural type: only use methods that can be fully substituted and pass constraint checks #69226
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only, untriaged, 17.9
  • Switch MSBuildWorkspace to running builds out of proc #70469
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Integration fixes #70635
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: IOperation support #70650
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Indicate when syntax errors are first calculated. #70668
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Unskip error list tests #63623
  • Restrict EnableGenerateDocumentationFile to .NET 8 warning wave #70491
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • Support implicit indexer access in object initializers #70649
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Range, untriaged
  • Fix Crash in AbstractChangeImplementationCodeRefactoringProvider #70647
    Area-IDE, untriaged
